snippet: Meter Industries, a brand design and marketing consultancy in New York, is becoming  Marty Weiss and Friends, which will assemble creative teams for each project.
lead_paragraph: Meter Industries, a brand design and marketing consultancy in New York, is becoming  Marty Weiss and Friends, which will assemble creative teams for each project.

headline.main: Ad Veteran’s New Venture Relies on His Friends
